pages.text: Welcome to $(aoa)!$(br2)This mod is a big one, and it covers many areas of Minecraft - so it's a bit easy to get lost. But don't worry! There are a few things we can start off with to get you set up!
pages.title: Getting Started

pages.text: First of all, you're going to want to find shelter. The Overworld can get dangerous, so it's very important that you have a place to retreat in order to recharge and heal.$(br)Your best bet is to quickly grab a pickaxe and dig your way into a hill, or into the ground. Make a small hole and mark it on the outside so you know where to find it later.

From there, you will want to take your time building up your resources so that you don't starve, and equipping yourself with some basic armour and a weapon. The main thing to remember is to be careful!$(br2)Once you're ready to go, you're going to want to go very deep underground and start digging around for a $(l:aoa3:getting_started#ruined_teleporter_frame)Ruined Teleporter Frame$(/l), guarded by a $(l:aoa3:getting_started#corrupted_traveller)Corrupted Traveller$(/l).
Help him out, and he'll give you something to keep you going.$(br2)While you're there, scavenge some $(thing)Ancient Rock$() for later.
Ruined Teleporter Frames generate deep underground, near the base of the world.
pages.title: Ruined Teleporter Frame

pages.text: Corrupted Travellers can be found tethered to their $(l:aoa3:getting_started#ruined_teleporter_frame)Ruined Teleporter Frame$(/l), unable to leave.
